title: Warring kingdoms Vi can't be found in the store.
body: Was her skin a limited time only skin? I just bought rp to get her . .  just to not find her in the store. I mean not long ago she got released.

replies.body: Per the [Lunar Revel ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/lunar-revel-bundles-legacy-skins)sale page, the event ended yesterday.  Any legacy skins, including Warring Kingdoms Vi, has returned to the vault.  Legacy can appear at another date whenever announced, or hextech crafting.  Let me know if that clears things up!

So sorry to say this but I believe that the Lunar Event (alongside your Warring Kingdoms Vi) is now gone.

EDIT: Official announcement here. 
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/lunar-revel-2017-ending-soon

so many warring kingdom out there.. its a theme. i dont understand why a certain theme skin is limited but not all.. makes absolutely NO sense to me.. also the gifting center.. it is really annyoing that i cant gift friends with RP i already have.. i NEED to buy NEW RP to gift them if i want to.. so if i have 12000 RP just sitting here.. i cant gift them because it needs to be NEWLY purchased RP specifically bought for gifting before it can be done... why is that???
If you gift them the skin or champ, it doesn't require a new purchase
